name: Luqman but better
description:
Play with your friends (if you have any) in this awesome online multiplayer game.

This is a ripoff of a game called Luqman Reloaded . I told the developer i would remake his game in 48 hours but better.
Well.. here it is!

How To Play:
Use LMB to launch yourself into a certain direction and shoot a rocket into the opposite direction to kill your enemies

Phone and Mac version will follow
